issue.title: [Website] Add link to R documentation site
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6246](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6246). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-6139 added the R documentation at /docs/r/, but we still need to link to it from the website header.
